div.div: Plymouth State vs. Western New England
at Springfield, Mass. | Golden Bear Stadium

tr.td: Plymouth State wins toss, elects to receive.

Andrew Foglia rush for 2 yards to the WNE49 (Wojciechowski;Kevin Soule).
